name: L.A.S.E.R. (fredstoyva)
description:
Great big sphere colliders with spatial audio emitters are attacking! It's up to everyone  with a keen sense of hearing to L.A.S.E.R - listen, aim, shoot, enjoy, repeat! 

L.A.S.E.R. is controlled using only the mouse. Enemies will spawn randomly around you - listen to their signature sound in order to pinpoint their location. Shoot them before they reach yours.

  • To aim your gun, move your mouse horizontally.
  • To shoot, click the left mouse button.
  • To hear your current stats, click the right mouse button.

Be sure to conserve your ammo. You start out with three bullets. For each enemy hit you gain three bullets.

Best of luck!

---

This game was made for the Hodur Gamejam hosted by Feldo. Big thanks to Feldo for the inspiration!
